page.title: 14MEDIEVAL MAY DAY/OWERMOIGNE
page.content: FIRST IN OUR{MEDIEVAL MAY DAY} {CELEBRATIONS}WAS THE GRAND PARADE.THE BOYS WORE TUNICS AND THE GIRLS LONG DRESSES AND TALL HATS.AFTER THE SCHOOL CRIER CALLED "OYEZ" WE DID A{MAYPOLE} {DANCE.}THEN THE ATTENDANTS{CROWNED}THE {MAY QUEEN.}SHE CHOSE A{MAY KING}AND THEY DANCED{HASTE TO THE WEDDING.AFTER SOME{JOUSTING}THE OTHER CLASSES DID COUNTRY{DANCING AND SINGING.}IT WAS A {SPECIAL MAY DAY}BECAUSE{MRS SADLER}WAS CELEBRATING{50 YEARS AS A SCHOOL } {GOVERNOR.}THE MAY QUEEN GAVE HER SOME {FLOWERS,}THE MAY KING GAVE HER AN {ENGRAVED GLASS}AND THEN A{CAKE}THAT THE SCHOOL CHILDREN HAD MADE AND DECORATED.LASTLY THE CHILDREN HAD DRINKS AND CAKES.THE WHOLE PROGRAMME WAS{RECORDED ON VIDEO. } {BY MATTHEW WAITE} {& KELLY TAYLOR}
